snippet: The FF’s mandate is to meld the performance of a Ferrari supercar with the utility of an all-wheel-drive luxury wagon, but one with the most powerful engine ever installed in a road-going Ferrari.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of 2012 Ferrari FF.
lead_paragraph: The FF’s mandate is to meld the performance of a Ferrari supercar with the utility of an all-wheel-drive luxury wagon, but one with the most powerful engine ever installed in a road-going Ferrari.

headline.seo: Family Travel at the $300,000 Price Point
headline.main: Family Travel at the $300,000 Price Point
headline.print_headline: Family Travel at the $300,000 Price Point
